keyMoments.title: Luffy Unleashes Conqueror's Haki
keyMoments.description: Luffy unknowingly unleashes Conqueror's Haki for the second time in the series while desperately trying to protect Marguerite from being destroyed. The burst of Supreme King Haki knocks out many Kuja warriors and shocks the Gorgon sisters.
keyMoments.significance: This is the first official recognition of Luffy's Conqueror's Haki in the series, confirming he possesses one of the rarest abilities in the world - a power only one in a million people have.
keyMoments.quote: I told you to stop, dammit!

keyMoments.title: Luffy Hurt by Armament Haki
keyMoments.description: Luffy discovers his rubber body can be damaged by the Gorgon sisters' Armament Haki attacks, experiencing for the first time that his Devil Fruit immunity has a counter.
keyMoments.significance: This moment teaches Luffy that his Devil Fruit powers alone are not enough to face top-tier opponents, foreshadowing his need to learn Haki himself.

keyMoments.title: Luffy's Unawareness of His Power
keyMoments.description: After unleashing Conqueror's Haki, Luffy remains completely unaware of what he did, thanking the sisters for 'listening to him' instead of realizing he forced them to stop with his willpower.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that Luffy's Conqueror's Haki is involuntary and unconscious, setting up his future training to control this power.

abilities.description: Supreme King Haki - an extremely rare form of Haki that allows the user to exert their willpower over others, causing those with weak wills to lose consciousness. Luffy uses this unconsciously when desperate to protect others.

relationships.description: Hancock recognizes Luffy as a fellow Conqueror's Haki user, beginning her respect for him.

evolutionMoments.description: Hancock witnesses Luffy's Supreme King Haki and realizes he possesses the same rare power she has.

relationships.description: Luffy's desperation to protect Marguerite's petrified statue triggers his Conqueror's Haki.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy's determination to save Marguerite causes him to unleash Conqueror's Haki.

reveals.information: Luffy possesses Conqueror's Haki (Supreme King Haki), a power only one in a million people have
Luffy's rubber body can be hurt by Armament Haki

keyMoments.title: Hancock Recognizes Luffy's Supreme King Haki
keyMoments.description: Boa Hancock is shocked to witness Luffy unleash Conqueror's Haki, the same rare power she possesses. She realizes Luffy has the 'disposition of a king.'
keyMoments.significance: This is a turning point in Hancock's perception of Luffy, marking the beginning of her respect and eventually romantic feelings for him.

relationships.description: Hancock begins to respect Luffy after seeing he possesses Conqueror's Haki like herself.

evolutionMoments.description: Hancock witnesses Luffy's Conqueror's Haki and recognizes him as a fellow Supreme King.

reveals.information: Hancock also possesses Conqueror's Haki (confirmed by her recognition of Luffy's power)

name.japanese: ボア・サンダーソニア

keyMoments.title: Sandersonia Transforms into Anaconda
keyMoments.description: Boa Sandersonia transforms into her anaconda hybrid form using the Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: Anaconda. The Kuja believe this is the Gorgon's curse, but Luffy recognizes it as a Devil Fruit power.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the true nature of the 'Gorgon curse' legend - the sisters have Devil Fruit powers, not a mythical curse.

keyMoments.title: Observation Haki Demonstrated
keyMoments.description: Sandersonia demonstrates mastery of Observation Haki through her Snake Dance technique, predicting and dodging all of Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Gatling attacks.
keyMoments.significance: First clear demonstration of Observation Haki in the series, showing how users can foresee their opponent's moves.

keyMoments.title: Threatens Marguerite's Statue
keyMoments.description: Sandersonia picks up Marguerite's petrified statue and threatens to shatter it, counting down to smash it. This threat triggers Luffy's Conqueror's Haki outburst.
keyMoments.significance: Serves as the catalyst for one of the most important power reveals in the series.

abilities.description: A technique combining Observation Haki with her snake form's flexibility to predict and dodge attacks by foreseeing the opponent's next move.
The ability to sense the presence of others and predict their movements before they act.
The ability to create an invisible armor that can harm Devil Fruit users and bypass their powers.

reveals.information: Ate the Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: Anaconda
Master of Observation Haki and Armament Haki

name.japanese: ボア・マリーゴールド

keyMoments.title: Marigold Transforms into King Cobra
keyMoments.description: Boa Marigold transforms into her King Cobra hybrid form using the Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: King Cobra, revealing that the 'Gorgon curse' is actually a Devil Fruit power.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the truth behind the Gorgon legend and demonstrates another snake Zoan transformation.

keyMoments.title: Armament Haki Against Luffy
keyMoments.description: Marigold uses Armament Haki to strike Luffy, demonstrating that his rubber body can be harmed by this power.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the concept of Armament Haki as a counter to Devil Fruit immunity.

abilities.description: The ability to create an invisible armor that can harm Devil Fruit users and bypass their powers.
The ability to sense the presence of others.

reveals.information: Ate the Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: King Cobra
Can use Armament Haki and Observation Haki

keyMoments.title: Marguerite's Statue Threatened
keyMoments.description: Marguerite's petrified statue is threatened with destruction by Sandersonia, causing Luffy to desperately unleash Conqueror's Haki to save her.
keyMoments.significance: Though petrified, Marguerite serves as the catalyst for Luffy's most important power reveal in the arc.

relationships.description: Luffy's determination to protect Marguerite triggers his Conqueror's Haki.

evolutionMoments.description: Threat to Marguerite's statue causes Luffy to unleash his Supreme King Haki.
